product_name: Aqua Sphere Kaiman Smoke Lens Swimming Goggles - Men's
long_description: Strap on the Aqua Sphere Kaiman Smoke swim goggles and hit the lanes; the tinted lenses and adjustable fit are sure to please. Scratch-resistant Plexisol(R) lenses help keep your vision clear with their antifog properties, and they offer 100% UVA and UVB protection. Smoke lenses excel in bright light and outdoor settings. Hypoallergenic silicone gasket skirt creates a watertight seal and feels soft against skin. Lenses provide 180deg, distortion-free vision, and a high degree of scratch- and fog-resistance. Aqua Sphere Kaiman Clear Lens swim goggles secure the fit with a nonslip headstrap with easy-adjust, locking side buckles.
short_description: Strap on the Aqua Sphere Kaiman Smoke swim goggles and hit the lanes; the tinted lenses and adjustable fit are sure to please.
